name: Roll 'N Nudge
description: Roll 'N Nudge is a basic four wheel fruit machine simulator for one player. You start with 40 coins. Some wheel combinations enables the nudge option so that you can move the wheels a bit, other combinations enables the hold option and some even lets you gamble for high prizes, but the gambling option may backfire and make you lose some coins. When you run out of coins you may restart with 40 new coins or exit to GEM.

shot.caption: The gambling option in action, x4 would not be bad to get.
I'm holding the three melons and hope for the best
